title: referendum
description: referendum proposing a new law or a change in some existing law

key.description: public key of the author of the referendum

signature.description: signature of the author of the referendum

published.description: date of the publication of the referendum

description.description: detailed description of the referendum (markdown allowed)

question.description: question to which the citizen should answer

answers.description: possible answers to the above question, typically, yes, no, abstain

areas.description: areas in which the citizen should live to vote for this referendum

type.description: type of area (city, department, state, county, country, etc.)

polygons.description: polygons of GPS coordinates points defining the area

trusters.description: trusters that should be used to process this referendum

trust.description: minimum trust from this truster necessary to vote for this referendum

websites.description: websites providing more information about the referendum
